mapper.update: update maintenance_record set vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maintenance_costs = #{maintenanceCosts,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, maintenance_begin_time = #{maintenanceBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, maintenance_end_time = #{maintenanceEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where maintenance_id = #{maintenanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select maintenance_id, vehicle_id, `describe`, maintenance_costs, maintenance_begin_time, maintenance_end_time, create_time, update_time from maintenance_record where maintenance_id = #{maintenanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select maintenance_id, vehicle_id, `describe`, maintenance_costs, maintenance_begin_time, maintenance_end_time, create_time, update_time from maintenance_record
